summary: ACP Vijay Khanna is transferred to Mumbai where he will have do deal with the oil mafia led by Rudra Pratap Teja.
cast: Ram Charan|Priyanka Chopra|Sanjay Dutt|Prakash Raj|Atul Kulkarni|Mahie Gill|Aditya Lakhia|Daya Shankar Pandey|Bikramjeet Singh|Ankur Bhatia|Navdeep Tomar|Chetan Pandit|Naushaad Abbas|Taran Bajaj|Kavita Kaushik|Mangala Kenkre|Elisha Kriis|Sanjay Sharma|Charanpreet Singh|Jeetu Verma|Apoorva Lakhia
title: Zanjeer
